data.text: Not a bad stay by any stretch, however the photos possibly over glamorise the primitive decor and basic amenities here. What we thought would be quite a modern and chic looking hotel is actually quite cheaply done when looked at close-up. The staff weren’t really that engaging and the location of the hotel is in an area of Barcelona that many reviews and travel experts recommend is avoided owing to its crime. In actual fact we didn’t find the area that much of a problem. I think it probably gets a bad rap owing to the immigrant community, however we found everyone delightful and welcoming. The pool was closed during our entire stay there, which was a disappointment as there were some quite nice days when we would’ve liked to have enjoyed it.
data.title: Not a bad stay, but don’t expect luxury

data.text: This was a great place to stay in! The service was great, the room were very clean and always filled with whatever you may need. The breakfast was my favorite because you could find a variety of food to choose from even if you are a vegetarian. Great experience! If I ever come back to Barcelona I will stay here for sure. I recommend it 100%.
data.title: Great hotel!

data.text: Don’t let the reviews about the area put you off, the area is plenty busy with tourists and the like, we never felt uncomfortable here and it isn’t down a ‘dodgy’ street like you may anticipate based on reviews. The hotel is very secure, clean and friendly and is a perfect location for the centre of Barcelona at a super reasonable price. The pool area is lovely to relax after a long day of walking and the breakfast is minimal but great. Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone! Staff are lovely and friendly from reception, house keeping and breakfast.
data.title: Central hotel, very clean, would definitely return!

data.text:
Arrived back in Barcelona from 12 day cruise on board the MSC Magnifica and had an overnight stay in  this three star hotel just off Las Ramblas so it’s very central 
Must say I was pleasantly surprised how inexpensive it was as we are talking about a very central location for this city
The hotel itself was clean and staff very helpful ,the rooms clean tidy if a downside they were a bit stark and clinical but comfortable and bathroom was lovely
Breakfast was also included in the price and was plentiful and warm
This hotel has a rooftop pool but alas never got chance to use it but was lucky enough to have a room with a balcony and hope to stay there again when I once again visit this beautiful city
data.title: Obrigado

user_location.name: Strathpeffer, Ross and Cromarty, Scottish Highlands, Scotland

data.text:
Was a little bit sceptical after reading some negative reviews but this quickly vanished after arriving. Hotel is modern and simple and we loved that doors are secure at all times. Initially we were given wrong room number but was quickly sorted for us. Our room was clean and spacious and had everything we needed during our short visit to Barcelona. Air con didn't work the first night but after speaking with reception, this was quickly fixed. Location was brilliant. 5 mins max to Las Ramblas and 15 mins to El Born area that is full of great bars, cafes, restaurants and shops. Breakfast had an excellent range and was delicious

Would definitely recommend this hotel.
data.title: Excellent Value for Money - Would Visit Again!
